body_html:
@mcarilli Thanks for the references! I think these are great starting points to remove the use of tensor dict keys. @vishwakftw Yeah, I don't know how to find out all of the use cases in the codebase. Any suggestions? cc @apaszke @zou3519

Maybe to raise an error with some guidance at __hash__() in case someone tries to use it/was using it?

body:
@mcarilli Thanks for the references! I think these are great starting points to remove the use of tensor dict keys. @vishwakftw Yeah, I don't know how to find out all of the use cases in the codebase. Any suggestions? cc @apaszke @zou3519 

Maybe to raise an error with some guidance at `__hash__()` in case someone tries to use it/was using it?
